column1: **{attacker}** throws a pillow at Spica! She giggles and throws one back.
**{attacker}** tries to bonk Spica! Spica dodges gracefully like a dream.
**{attacker}** prays too hard and accidentally hits Spica with a starlight beam!
**{attacker}** challenges Spica! But Spica simply vanishes into mist.
